venue.name: Barnes & Noble Booksellers Buckland Hills Mall

item.description:
Let's Play!

Storytime
The weather is warmer and summer is just around the corner! Now is the perfect time to read some great books about playing outside! Come and enjoy some of our favorites, and let us know which ones are your favorites too! Stay for the fun craft too!

 

LadyBug Girl:

At the playground, Lulu asks her friend Sam if he wants to play with her. Sam likes Diggers, while Lulu thinks Monkeys is the best game. Sam suggests playing under the castle, but Lulu knows that the top is the most fun. They just can?t agree! And then Lulu asks, ?Have you ever played Ladybug Girl??

As Ladybug Girl and Bumblebee Boy, Lulu and Sam save the playground from hairy monsters and big mean robots, and have their very own parade on the bouncy dinosaurs. They figure out that when they work together, they can create fun games that they both like to play.

 

Watch Me Throw the Ball

Gerald is careful. Piggie is not.Piggie cannot help smiling. Gerald can.
Gerald worries so that Piggie does not have to.  Gerald and Piggie are best friends.

In Watch Me Throw the Ball!, Gerald is determined to teach Piggie that ball-throwing is serious business... but Piggie is just as determined to have serious fun.

group.name: The Greater Hartford Area Parents Meetup Group

item.name: Let's Play (at Barnes and Noble!)!
